messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Welcome crew, remember your suit sensors and have a safe shift

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Our informant upon your station has contacted us with a alegation of Gross msconduct. Unless you have physical evidence that the security officer is a traitor his charge should have been no more than 5 minutes. As such he is recieving a full pardon Unless such evidence can be presented within the next 5 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You still have 3 minutes to present the evidence, I repeat unless that evidence is presented the Security Officer Will receive a full pardon.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: As of this moment the Security Officer Charles Swanson has recieved a pardon, and should no longer be prosecuted against by any member of the station.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Charles H. Swanson Report to HoP desk to reclaim your PDA and ID immediately

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Engineer's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Machine Learning Alert

Rampant brand intelligence has been detected aboard Space Station 13. Please stand by. The origin is believed to be an AutoDrobe.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Engineer's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

Simulations on acausal dimensional event complete. Deploying solution package now. Deployment ETA: ONE MINUTE.
